meanings.sent1: The supervised children played safely in the park.
meanings.sent2: The supervised experiment yielded accurate results.
meanings.sent3: The supervised puppy tried to sneak away but was caught by its owner.
meanings.sent4: The supervised team followed the coach's instructions to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The supervised students completed their tasks with guidance and support.

meanings.sent1: The teacher supervised the students during the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: She supervised the construction project to ensure it was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat supervised the mouse running around the room.
meanings.sent4: The manager supervised the employees to maintain productivity.
meanings.sent5: He supervised the event to make sure everything ran smoothly.

meanings.definition: Under the watchful eye of someone in authority
meanings.sent1: The children played supervised in the playground.
meanings.sent2: The workers operated the machinery supervised by the supervisor.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel cheekily stole the nuts while being supervised by the vigilant cat.
meanings.sent4: The students completed the exam supervised by the strict teacher.
meanings.sent5: The athletes trained supervised to prevent injuries.
